pages.title: Largetooth Sawfish
pages.text: The largetooth sawfish ($(o)Pristis pristis, syn.$(br2)P. microdon and P. perotteti$()) is a species of sawfish in the family Pristidae.$(br2)It is found worldwide in tropical and subtropical coastal regions, but also enters freshwater.

pages.title: Largetooth Sawfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: None Days
